titles.title: A bill for the relief of Abraham Jaars, Delicia Jaars, and Grant Jaars.
A bill for the relief of Abraham Jaars, Delicia Jaars, and Grant Jaars.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Abraham Jaars, Delicia Jaars, and Grant Jaars each to have been lawfully admitted to, and remained in, the United States and to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status under provisions of the Immigration and Nationality Act providing for the adjustment of status of a nonimmigrant to that of a person admitted for permanent residence.
